task_text: [Epidemiology][Summarization + Factual-Retrieval] Provide the criteria defining pandemic phases in the CDC document and summarize how thresholds trigger policy escalation.

gold_end_state.summary: CDC criteria include epidemiological indicators such as sustained community transmission, healthcare capacity strain, and geographic spread; when thresholds (e.g., increasing case rates or rising hospitalization trends) are met, policies escalate from containment to mitigation, including broader NPIs and resource mobilization.

quiz.question: Which indicator is commonly used to trigger escalation from containment to mitigation?

arguments.text: CDC pandemic phases and trigger thresholds
